================
**Government Tender Announcement: Battery Electric Transit Bus**

**Title:** Battery Electric Transit Bus
**Reference Number:** WS3784125814-Doc4322152564 (amendment 7)
**Solicitation Number:** WS3784125814
**Notice Date:** 11 December 2023
**Tender Closing Date:** 27 February 2024, 14:00 HNE

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites interested suppliers to submit bids for the provision of two (2) Battery Electric Transit Buses to the Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) in Regina, SK, Canada.

**Key Information:**

* **Type of Solicitation:** Request for Proposal (RFP)
* **Competition Method:** Competitive - Open bidding
* **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price
* **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Regions of Opportunity:** Saskatchewan
* **Regions of Delivery:** Regina, Saskatchewan

The proposal must be submitted in accordance with the requirements specified in the solicitation documents. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by 27 February 2024, 14:00 HNE. Any bid submitted after this time will be considered non-responsive.

A debriefing or feedback session will be provided upon request to suppliers who submitted an offer in the previous solicitation.

**Contact Information:**

* **Name:** Jacques Legault (SPAC/PSPC)
* **Email:** jacques.legault@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

The tender description is available at the following URL: <https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18243913?extsite=MTgyNDM5MTNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==>

**Attachments:** None

**Cancellation:**

This solicitation cancels and supersedes previous RFP solicitation number Doc3846897372 dated 2 February 2023 with a closing date of 24 April 2023 at 14:00 HNE. A debriefing or feedback session will be provided upon request to suppliers who submitted an offer in the previous solicitation.
